attributes.review: Absolutely horrendous took 17 days to download! I hate it with a passion and do not recommend it. honesty NEEDS to be taken out of the app store. it's fake and a bunch of lies. i feel like my account couldn't be hacked and my address could get out! ENDLESS YOU WANT PEOPLE TO KNOW WHERE YOU LIVE AND BE KILLED DO NOT DOWNLOAD! SAVE YOURSELVES!
